title: Apply basic arithmetic formulas (SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT) to analyze numeric data
learning_objectives: Apply basic arithmetic formulas (SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT) to analyze numeric data

vocabulary.definition: An expression that calculates a value, always starting with an equals sign (=)
Adds all numbers in a range of cells (e.g., =SUM(A1:A10))
Calculates the arithmetic mean of a range of numbers
Counts how many cells contain numeric values in a range
A group of cells defined by the first and last cell separated by a colon (e.g., A1:A10)
The input values or cell references provided to a function in parentheses
